replies.body: league of legends is a third person shooter about an armored bear trying to get his deserved buffs

I thought it was a JRPG about an armored armadillo with limited vocabulary and human sentience using his head to break giant magical stone turrets until he gets to blow up a giant crystal.

Please explain, it can't both be the same thing, man.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kw0gETN9,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2018-12-14T04:53:33.648+0000)

> 
> Please explain, it can't both be the same thing, man.

No dude that's the Expansion Pack.

It costs $19.99 and is only out for a limited time! Buy RIGHT NOW!!!

Looks at small print on leagues client 
"now partnered with EA"
*curls up and cries in a corner*
To be fair they are finally buffing Kalista
That's a nerf to the armored bear by comparison.

League of Legends is a one versus nine solo-carry dog-vision simulator where monkeys - who choose the most broken meta shit with crazy ideas like obscured stealth - are required to flame their team to get executed by dragon, oneshot the opposition and flash as much masteries as possible. League of Legends taps into toxic social fundamentals of human nature and, alongside spamming EZ on win, can be utilised to teach asian-monk-level of calmness and dating history of your mother thorugh revelations by enemy team members that is already engaging to asocials.

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kw0gETN9,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-12-13T23:11:09.970+0000)
>
> League of Legends is a one versus nine solo-carry dog-vision simulator where monkeys - who choose the most broken meta shit with crazy ideas like obscured stealth - are required to flame their team to get executed by dragon, oneshot the opposition and flash as much masteries as possible. League of Legends taps into toxic social fundamentals of human nature and, alongside spamming EZ on win, can be utilised to teach asian-monk-level of calmness and dating history of your mother thorugh revelations by enemy team members that is already engaging to asocials.

I learnt a new word after reading this. "Asocials".

> I learnt a new word after reading this. "Asocials".

Yeah I haven't really seen it be used but I suppose it is logical

Theist ---> Atheist
Social ---> Asocial

> fuscous: dark and sombre in colour

make that 2

Lol, it's this mentality that kinda ruins games imo.

I know you're probably joking, but a lot of people take this seriously and consider the game a 1v9, when in reality helping your team by holding a wave/not being a dick/not griefing by stealing cs/etc actually help you climb faster and win more games.
{{champion:67}} What do you mean he's probably joking

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kw0gETN9,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-12-13T23:11:45.892+0000)
>
> {{champion:67}} What do you mean he's probably joking

well it IS memes and games xD

While I understand the sentiment, it was not my intention to sow negativity into the community or this game. The intent of this meme was to acknowledge that some games actually do feel less like a 5v5, with us players having to battle against either negative teammates or very poorly performing teammates. 

That's not to say that these games can't be won, or that teamwork doesn't improve your chances of winning; it just means that some games are feelsbad games, where you really do feel like the odds are stacked against you.

for real. I played a ranked game with 4 people all trying to solo carry by 1v9ing. All they ended up doing was running in 1v5 over and over again and throwing away any chance of victory. Teamplay>everything else.

Joke

-whoosh-

your head
I understand the joke, but I also recognize that this line of logic is extremely limited and damaging.
You. must. be. fun. at. parties.
Self awareness lmao
have you tried playing with Wuks too?

https://imgur.com/a/Sf9RAMq




fixed the image for you
Actually we are part of a social experiment where we are matched with genetically modified monkeys as a team and we play versus next generation A.I. For a monkey they are rather good.

I actually thought League of Legends was about a Stone-throwing girl with a crush on some hisagi guy. I was wrong.

{{champion:163}}
A 1v9 where you question if the 4 people on your team are in reality someone's pet or if they are trying to win blind folded.
https://i.redd.it/uwmhft83zowz.png

An abusive relationship between Riot and the players and between the players and other players, where Riot ignores the players and what they want to see, how they want the game to be balanced etc. They just think we're all stupid and they just want to milk us of our money, and we just want to have fun. We're too addicted to the game and too in love with the characters and we feel chained down by the money we've already put in. "ADCs are weak nerf damage so they survive!" *Riot proceeds to give Vayne invisibility for every other auto attack and buffs Nasus' damage instead of what he actually needs to be viable* "Riot Sejuani isn't doing so well, can you help her out?" *Riot proceeds to remove most of her CC and give her insane damage buffs instead* "What have you DONE!?"
Its nice to see someone understand what this game is truly about nowdays.
Oh, you
Baby dont hurt me
